title.narrative: HENAN TOWNS WATER SUPPLY AND SANITATION PROJECT

description.narrative: The objective of the Project is to assist the Borrower’s Henan Province in expanding its water supply and wastewater management services and improving the institutional capacity of relevant institutions to plan, regulate and operate such services.

provider-org.narrative: International Bank for Reconstruction and Development

condition.narrative: Each LP Company to furnish a time-bound action plan to improve its financial performance and implement said plan
Have in place and begin operational and monitoring procedures to ensure that the operational pond level at Longxingsi and BoshanReservoirs is maintained at safe levels before and during flood seasons
Prepare and furnish a mid-term report on progress
Review MTR report with Bank and take measures to ensure completion of project

title.narrative: Aggregate net profit after taxes of participating WSCs (in million RMB)

comment.narrative: No change to the previous one updated in June 2012.
The revised target in the restructuring is 69.34.

Revised YR6 (2012) target = RMB 69.34 M. The figure of RMB -558.07 million is based on the data collected from 20 countiesremaining in the project at the end of 2012. The current data may not reflect the true financial status of the project utilities assome of them still remain under government control.

title.narrative: Number of people with access to improved water supply in project towns (in thousands)

comment.narrative: No change to the previous one updated in June 2012.
The revised target in the restructuring is 2,360.
The revised YR6 (2012) target was 2,360. The figure of 1934.3 is based on the data collected from 20 counties remaining in theproject at the end of 2012.

title.narrative: Number of people with access to wastewater management services in project towns (in thousands)

comment.narrative: No change to the previous one updated in June 2012.
The revised target in the Restructuring is 563.

Revised YR6 (2012) target was 563. The figure of 837 is based on the data collected from 20 counties remaining in the project atthe end of 2012. The ICR mission will review this data to make sure correct data are collected.

title.narrative: Number of people in urban areas provided with access to Improved Water Sources under the project

comment.narrative: This is a revised target. The number is in thousand.
The above figure reflects the value as of December 31, 2012. The number is in thousand.
The above figure reflects the value of December 31, 2012. The number is in thousand.

title.narrative: Number of water utilities that the project is supporting

comment.narrative: There were 35 water supply companies to be supported by the Project at the project appraisal.
The above figure reflects the value of December 31, 2012.
